item.title: Archetypes of the Data Scientist Role
item.description: Data science roles can be very different, and job postings are not always clear. What hat do you want toÂ wear? After the positive responses to my recent post in Towards Data Science about Machine Learning Engineers , I thought I would write a bit about what I think are the real categories of roles for data science practitioners in the job market. While I was previously talking about the candidates, e.
